awd_titl_txt: REU:  Nitrogen Cycling in the Upper Ocean of an OligotrophicGyre
awd_abstract_narration: Dr. Garside in collaboration with Dr. McCarthy of                          Harvard University will study nitrogen cycling and particulate                  matter and nitrate isotopic signature in the northern                           Sargasso Sea.  The researchers will use the                                     chemoluminescent nitrate technique and improved ammonium                        analysis to provide the most sensitive analysis to date of                      nitrogen cycling in oligotrophic waters.  Nitrogen is a                         plant nutrient that is thought to limit biological                              productivity in much of the world ocean.  The question of                       nitrogen cycling in oligotrophic oceans will be advanced by                     the application of the state of the art techniques applied                      in this work.

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SUPP-Res Exp for Ugrd Supp
